text: Suppose on a particular machine, the select function find the median of an array in O (n) time. Suppose select function require 0.5 second to find the median of an array of size 216, How long do you expect select to take on the same machine to find the median of an array of size 224 ? (a) 4 minute 16 seconds (b) 2 minute 8 seconds (c) 8 minute 32 seconds (d) 17 minute 4 seconds
